discoveries.purpose: Specialized subagent definitions for orchestrated workflows
organization_rules: Flat structure - All agent specs at root level, no subdirectories
One agent per file - Each .md file defines exactly one agent
Standardized format - All agents follow template structure with role, input/output, workflow, quality, and safety sections

discoveries.purpose: Slash command definitions for Claude Code workflows
organization_rules: Flat structure - All command definitions at root level
One command per file - Each .md file defines exactly one slash command
README.md contains comprehensive quick reference guide
Command files include usage examples and best practices
discoveries.readme_md_status: existing README.md preserved (comprehensive quick reference guide)

discoveries.purpose: Project documentation, configuration guides, and workflow reports
discoveries.naming_convention: mixed: UPPERCASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES.md for guides, kebab-case.md for technical docs, {type}-{workflow}-{timestamp}.json for reports
organization_rules: Root docs/ - High-level guides and configuration documentation only
Workflow subdirectories - All workflow-generated JSON files go in docs/dev/ or docs/clean/
Timestamped files - Workflow reports include ISO-8601 timestamps in filename
Archive old reports - Consider archiving workflow reports older than 30 days

discoveries.purpose: Automation scripts for project workflows and helper utilities
organization_rules: Root scripts/ - Main workflow scripts only
Subdirectories by language - Python utilities in scripts/todo/, scripts/utils/, etc.
Executable permissions - All .sh files must have chmod +x
Helper script pattern - Scripts should be callable from orchestrator
Gitignore .pyc files - Bytecode should never be committed

discoveries.purpose: Claude Code lifecycle hooks for automation and safety
discoveries.naming_convention: kebab-case for scripts, UPPERCASE for documentation
organization_rules: Root hooks/ - Main hook scripts and documentation
Subdirectory hooks/git-hooks/ - Git-specific hooks
Configuration templates - JSON templates for project settings
Environment files - .env.example for configuration examples
discoveries.readme_md_status: existing README.md preserved (comprehensive auto-commit setup guide)

Generated INDEX.md files for all 5 folders
Generated new README.md files for: agents, docs, scripts
Preserved existing README.md files for: commands, hooks
Discovered naming conventions: kebab-case (agents, commands, scripts, hooks), mixed (docs)
Identified file type restrictions per folder
Documented organization rules from git commit patterns
